title: Scott Mills on 24 years at Radio 1: 'Keep it simple and be kind'
description: The legendary DJ is leaving Radio 1, the station that has been his home since he joined in 1998.

title: Flexible firms take break from fixed bank holidays
description: Letting staff choose when to take bank holidays boosts work-life balance and productivity, some firms say.

title: Rohingya: ‘Kill us, but don’t deport us to Myanmar’
description: Five years after millions of Rohingyas fled genocide in Myanmar, they continue to live in perilous conditions.

title: On call with Italy's horseback doctor
description: Dr Roberto Anfosso and Ambra make house calls around the village of La Morra in the Piedmont region.

title: Champions League: 'Dogged Rangers fight way to place with big boys'
description: PSV were profligate, but that will matter little to resolute Rangers as they look forward to Champions League groups, writes Tom English.

title: British-Belgian pilot, 17, becomes youngest to fly around the world solo
description: British-Belgian teen flew through sandstorms and spent the night on an uninhabited island to break record.

title: Tiger Woods & Rory McIlroy launch 'high-tech golf league' aimed at younger fans
description: Tiger Woods and Rory McIlroy launch a new "high-tech golf league" intended to appeal to younger fans.

title: Red Arrows: What is going wrong at the RAF?
description: The air force is investigating allegations of unacceptable behaviour within the Red Arrows.

title: Whipsnade Zoo elephant's first steps pictured hours after birth
description: Keepers said the Asian elephant's arrival was a massive success for conservation of the species.

title: England v South Africa: Ollie Robinson replaces Matthew Potts
description: England recall pace bowler Ollie Robinson to their XI for the second Test against South Africa at Old Trafford, starting on Thursday.

title: Asda ends best before dates on 200 fresh products
description: The retailer becomes the latest UK supermarket to scrap best before dates on more than 200 products.

title: More BTec students could face delays to results
description: Exam board Pearson says a team is in place and results will be provided "as quickly as possible".

title: UK imports no fuel from Russia for first time
description: Imports of goods from Russia fell to £33m in June, the lowest level since 1997, official figures show.

title: Olympian Katie Archibald tried to save dying partner Rab Wardell
description: The gold medallist could not revive Rab Wardell after he suffered a cardiac arrest in bed beside her.

title: Women's World Cup qualifiers: England's Chloe Kelly and Fran Kirby out injured
description: Chloe Kelly, who scored the winner against Germany in the final of Euro 2022, is out of England's first squad since their historic Wembley triumph with injury.

title: Target of Liverpool shooting that killed Olivia Pratt-Korbel, 9, arrested
description: A man who was shot by a gunman as he ran into Olivia Pratt-Korbel's home is detained in hospital.

title: Eurotunnel Le Shuttle: Passengers stuck for hours inside tunnel
description: "Several people were freaking out," said one traveller, after a Calais to Folkestone train was evacuated.

title: Minimum wage should rise to £15 for all workers, says TUC
description: A higher rate should be paid to all workers, including under-23s, the Trades Union Congress says.

title: Canelo Alvarez v Gennady Golovkin III: Mexican world champion aims to send rival into retirement
description: Canelo Alvarez speaks to BBC Sport from inside his training camp before his trilogy fight against Gennady Golovkin.

title: Chip shops face 'extinction' amid cost of living crisis
description: The rising price of cod, sunflower oil and energy has left many shops struggling to survive.

title: Elton gives diners preview of Britney comeback song
description: Sir Elton John asks a French restaurant DJ to play his Britney Spears duet and streams the reactions.

title: 'I haven't looked back since my first ballet class'
description: An 11-year-old boy describes his excitement at being picked for a prestigious dance school.

title: Welcome to Wrexham: City in spotlight with Ryan Reynolds' new show
description: Fans praise Wrexham FC's celebrity owners ahead of reality show which puts "underdog" in spotlight.

title: PSV Eindhoven v Rangers in Champions League: Can Antonio Colak be hero?
description: A year on from dumping Rangers out of the Champions League, can Antonio Colak fire his new club to the group stage in the absence of Alfredo Morelos?

title: The pre-loved baby boxes being sent to Ukraine’s front line
description: The Scot Baby Box Appeal has been collecting aid for Ukrainians since the Russian invasion began.

title: Thames Water hosepipe ban comes into force in England
description: The Thames Water ban applies to 10 million customers in the Thames Valley and London.

title: What China's worst drought on record looks like
description: Satellite images show extent of severe drought along the Yangtze River in China
